title: Someting_wrong_of_server
text: proc_open 今天在部署服务器的时候，使用composer来安装依赖。遇到了 The Process class relies on proc_open, which is not available on your PHP installation. 开始的时候，我有些不知所措，于是冷静下来思考一番，然后goolge了一下 解决方法： 在php.ini中，找到disable_functions选项，看看后面是否有proc_open函数被禁用了，如果有的话，去掉即可 其实如果php的文档熟悉的话，应该马上就能知道proc_open实际上是一个函数，是php用来和shell交互的函数，一般这种可以直接作用于操作系统的函数是非常不安全的，对于这种不安全的函数，总是要做一些措施来进行保护 composer安装fxp插件时候提示内存不足OpenVZ架构是没法加这个 1.进入目录cd /var/ 2.获取要增加的SWAP文件块(这里以1GB为例)dd if=/dev/zero of=swapfile bs=1024 count=1038336 3.创建SWAP文件/sbin/mkswap swapfile 4.激活SWAP文件/sbin/swapon swapfile 5.查看SWAP信息是否正确/sbin/swapon –s 6.添加到fstab文件中让系统引导时自动启动echo "/var/swapfile swap swap defaults 0 0" >>/etc/fstab 权限 今天使用 Laravel 框架的过程中。。由于没有给正确的权限。。。导致出现各种错误。。 chmod -R 7777 folder 不编译php情况下安装openssl扩展Whoops, looks like something went wrong. 1.下载和使用的PHP相同版本的php源码包。解压后找打ext下面的openssl 文件夹/etc/php/bin/phpize(phpize的路径根据各自安装有所不同可以通过 whereis phpize 来查看) （如果遇到Cannot find config.m4. Make sure that you run /usr/local/bin/phpize in the top level source directory of the module,到openssl目录里面 mv config.0m4 config.m4 再执行phpize）2.执行 ./configure --with-php-config=/usr/local/php/bin/php-config(php-config文件的路径) make make test make install 要把openssl.so文件加入到php.ini中 extesion=openssl.so（如果没有设定extesion_dir，如extension_dir =/usr/local/php/lib/php/extensions/no-debug-non-zts-20131226/查看phpize执行后的生成的so文件的路径即可 laravel No supported encrypter found. The cipher and / or key length are invalidRun php artisan key:generate to generate a new keyThen add it to .env.example cp .env.example .env

title: Some trouble recently
text: Atom Git push failedEnter your folder and execute this command git remote set-url origin git@github.com:your_username/your_project.git Anyway to change UI/tab/tree view font size?I found a wonderful answer by Google https://github.com/atom/atom/issues/11905#issuecomment-224865625You can do it by editing two files: # init.coffee UIFontSize = 12 atom.commands.add 'atom-workspace', 'ui:increase-font-size': -> UIFontSize += 1 document.documentElement.style.fontSize = UIFontSize + 'px' 'ui:decrease-font-size': -> UIFontSize -= 1 document.documentElement.style.fontSize = UIFontSize + 'px' # keymap.cson 'atom-workspace': 'ctrl-+': 'ui:increase-font-size' 'ctrl--': 'ui:decrease-font-size' How to compile and run a c++ file like and IDE? I found this way to solve it; You should install a package https://atom.io/packages/atom-shell-commands By this command to install apm install atom-shell-commandsBe sure you had already installed Nodejs Edit config file (File->Open Your Config, or ~/.atom/config.cson) "atom-shell-commands": commands: [ { name: "compile" command: "g++" arguments: [ "{FileName}" "-o" "{FileNameNoExt}.exe" ] options: cwd: "{FileDir}" keymap: "ctrl-2" save: true } { name: "run" command: "cmd" arguments: [ "/C" "start" "C:/Users/Administrator/.atom/launch.cmd" "{FileNameNoExt}" ] options: cwd: "{FileDir}" keymap: "ctrl-1" save: true } ] Be sure that you had already added g++ to Path you can control the shortcuts by modifying keymap launch.cmd: @echo off %1 echo. pause exit More information hexo error deployer not found:githubnpm install hexo-deployer-git --save can’t open localhost:4000uninstall 福昕阅读器 or hexo s -p 5000 GitHub github for windows login failedgit config --global user.email yourmail git config --global user.name yourname installadd a hosts record 54.231.98.184 github-com.s3.amazonaws.com

title: Hello World
text: 关于博客的建立 本博客基于Hexo 的 Nano和yilia 两款theme的二次开发.过几天我会放出项目。 git clone https://github.com/Bocity/Bocity.git 另外本博客发表的内容为技术分析文和情感倾诉文,内容与政治立场无关。 Last 感谢爱人陪我在自习室敲的代码有你的陪伴真的好棒呢抱歉没有听你的话十二点就睡但是我还是很开心的写了这些话希望我们能够开心的走下去.晚安了end.
